remarks: A 1-dim subspace (atom) (of a left module or left vector space) equals the span of some vector.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Oct-2014.)
statement:
islsati.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
islsati.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
islsati.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
islsati $p |- ( ( W e. X /\ U e. A ) -> E. v e. V U = ( N ` { v } ) ) $.
$d N v $.
$d U v $.
$d V v $.
$d W v $.
$d X v $.
